sub_topic: Prove that the empty set is a subset of every set.
message_1: Let A be a set containing 10 elements. Determine whether the empty set ∅ is a subset of set A.
message_2: Yes, the empty set ∅ is a subset of set A. By definition, the empty set is a subset of every set, including set A. This is because there are no elements in the empty set that are not also in set A (or any other set).
